thread.title: Delhi Weather Update: Sudden Dust and Thunderstorms Hit Delhi and NCR, Forecast of Gusty Winds With Speed of 50-70 Kmph by IMD | 📰 LatestLY
thread.title_full: Delhi Weather Update: Sudden Dust and Thunderstorms Hit Delhi and NCR, Forecast of Gusty Winds With Speed of 50-70 Kmph by IMD | 📰 LatestLY

author: Team Latestly
title: Delhi Weather Update: Sudden Dust and Thunderstorms Hit Delhi and NCR, Forecast of Gusty Winds With Speed of 50-70 Kmph by IMD | 📰 LatestLY
text: A major dust storm hit Delhi-NCR on Friday evening with residents reporting power outage in their areas. Residents shared videos of sudden dust storm and thunderstorm slamming several parts of Delhi-NCR. In its weather forecast, the India Meteorological Department or IMD has also predicted dust storm with rain and gusty winds with speed of 50-70 Km/hour over and adjoining areas of entire Delhi and NCR including Ghaziabad, Noida and Gurugram. Delhi Weather Update: National Capital Records 14.7 Degrees Celsius As Minimum Temperature, AQI in ‘Poor’ Category. Delhi Weather Update India Meteorological Department tweets, "Duststorm/ thunderstorm with rain (followed by rain) and gusty winds with speed of 50-70 Km/h would occur over and adjoining areas of entire Delhi and NCR (Loni Dehat, Hindon AF Station, Ghaziabad, Indirapuram, Chhapraula, Noida, Dadri,… pic.twitter.com/tlR68iroOO — ANI (@ANI) May 10, 2024 Major dust storm in Delhi pic.twitter.com/PLrsKD2x5Z — 🦏 Payal M/પાયલ મેહતા/ पायल मेहता/ পাযেল মেহতা (@payalmehta100) May 10, 2024 Wth is happening in Delhi right now? This Dust Storm came out of nowhere Hope everyone’s fine pic.twitter.com/5DK0wzJhba — Shaurya👀 (@anythingtbf) May 10, 2024 Massive dust storm in Delhi . Complete power shutdown. Please stay safe. pic.twitter.com/DrVaHQfBuU — Barkha Trehan 🇮🇳 / बरखा त्रेहन (@barkhatrehan16) May 10, 2024
